Title: Prohibits gun industry members from directly advertising, marketing, promoting, designing, or selling certain firearm-related products to underage individuals
Summary: Prohibits gun industry members from directing advertising, marketing, promoting, designing, or selling certain firearm-related products in a manner that would encourage unlawful purchase, possession, or use by underage individuals in the state; provides criteria for determining whether a gun industry member reasonably appears to support, recommend, or encourage underage individuals to unlawfully purchase a qualified product.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting gun industry members from directly advertising, marketing, promoting, designing, or selling certain firearm-related products in a manner that would encourage unlawful purchase, possession, or use by underage individuals
